battle_traits.name: Deep Thinkers
battle_traits.effect:
You can only use this ability if you have not used any Facet of War abilities this battle round.

Add 1 to casting rolls for friendly Scinari units for the rest of the battle round.

battle_traits.name: Enduring As Rock
battle_traits.effect:
You can only use this ability if you have not used any Facet of War abilities this battle round.

Subtract 1 from the Rend characteristic of weapons used for attacks that target friendly Alarith units for the rest of the battle round.

battle_traits.name: Power of Hysh
battle_traits.declare: You can only use this ability if you have not used any Facet of War abilities this battle round. Pick a friendly Vanari unit to be the target.
battle_traits.effect: The target’s attacks score critical hits on unmodified hit rolls of 5+ for the rest of the battle round.

battle_traits.name: Shining Company
battle_traits.effect:
You can only use this ability if you have not used any Facet of War abilities this battle round.

Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target friendly Vanari units for the rest of the battle round.

battle_traits.name: Move Like the Wind
battle_traits.declare: You can only use this ability if you have not used any Facet of War abilities this battle round. Pick up to 3 friendly Hurakan units that are not in combat to be the targets.
battle_traits.effect: Each target can move a distance up to its Move characteristic. It cannot move into combat during any part of that move, and it cannot use Shoot abilities for the rest of the turn.

battle_traits.name: Lightning Reactions
battle_traits.effect: When players are alternating picking units to use a Fight ability, when it is your turn to pick a unit, you can pick 2 units instead of 1. Resolve the second Fight ability immediately after the first.

Alarith Temple.name: Alarith Fortitude
Alarith Temple.effect: You can use the ‘Enduring as Rock’ ability in addition to the other Facet of War ability used during the battle round.

Hurakan Temple.name: Grace of the Hurakan
Hurakan Temple.effect: You can use the ‘Move Like the Wind’ ability in addition to the other Facet of War ability used during the battle round.

Scinari Council.name: Lore of the Scinari
Scinari Council.effect: You can use the ‘Deep Thinkers’ ability in addition to the other Facet of War ability used during the battle round.

Vanari Battlehost.name: Vanari Brilliance
Vanari Battlehost.effect: You can use the ‘Power of Hysh’ ability in addition to the other Facet of War ability used during the battle round.

heroic_traits.name: Paragon of Hysh
heroic_traits.activation: Once Per Battle, Reaction: You declared the ‘Charge’ ability or a Spell ability for this unit
heroic_traits.effect: You can re-roll the charge roll or casting roll for that ability.

heroic_traits.name: Masterful Tactician
heroic_traits.activation: Reaction: You declared the ‘Redeploy’ command for a friendly Lumineth Realm‑lords unit wholly within 12" of this unit
heroic_traits.effect: If you roll a 1-3 when determining the distance that unit can move, you can use a value of 4 instead.

heroic_traits.name: Perfect Strike
heroic_traits.activation: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
heroic_traits.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
heroic_traits.effect: Inflict D3+3 mortal damage on the target.

artefacts_of_power.name: Silver Wand
artefacts_of_power.effect: If this unit is not a Wizard, it has Wizard (1). Otherwise, add 1 to this unit’s power level.

artefacts_of_power.name: Waystone
artefacts_of_power.activation: Once Per Battle, Your Movement Phase
artefacts_of_power.effect: Remove this unit from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

artefacts_of_power.name: Phoenix Stone
artefacts_of_power.effect: If this unit would be destroyed, before removing it from play, roll a dice. On a 3+, this unit is not destroyed and any remaining damage points inflicted on it have no effect. Then, Heal (1) this unit. This unit cannot use this ability again for the rest of the battle.

Lore of Hysh.name: Overwhelming Heat
Lore of Hysh.declare: Pick a friendly Lumineth Realm‑lords Wizard to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Lore of Hysh.effect: Halve the target’s Move characteristic until the start of your next turn, then roll a dice. If the roll equals or exceeds the target’s Save characteristic, inflict D3 mortal damage on it.

Lore of Hysh.name: Protection of Hysh
Lore of Hysh.declare: Pick a friendly Lumineth Realm‑lords Wizard to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Lore of Hysh.effect: Until the start of your next turn, friendly units have Ward (5+) while they are wholly within 12" of the caster.

Lore of Hysh.name: Speed of Hysh
Lore of Hysh.declare: Pick a friendly Lumineth Realm‑lords Wizard to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly Lumineth Realm‑lords unit wholly within 18" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Lore of Hysh.effect: Add 4" to the target’s Move characteristic until the start of your next turn.

Manifestations of Hysh.name: Summon Rune of Petrification
Manifestations of Hysh.declare: If there is not a friendly Rune of Petrification on the battlefield, pick a friendly Lumineth Realm‑lords Wizard to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Manifestations of Hysh.effect: Set up a Rune of Petrification wholly within 18" of the caster and visible to them.

Manifestations of Hysh.name: Summon Hyshian Twinstones
Manifestations of Hysh.declare: If there is not a friendly Hyshian Twinstones endless spell on the battlefield, pick a friendly Lumineth Realm‑lords Wizard to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Manifestations of Hysh.effect: Set up a Hyshian Twinstones endless spell wholly within 6" of the caster.

Manifestations of Hysh.name: Summon Sanctum of Amyntok
Manifestations of Hysh.declare: If there is not a friendly Sanctum of Amyntok on the battlefield, pick a friendly Lumineth Realm‑lords Wizard to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly Lumineth Realm‑lords Infantry Hero wholly within 12" of them and more than 3" from all other units and terrain features to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Manifestations of Hysh.effect: Set up a Sanctum of Amyntok within the target’s combat range, visible to the caster and not in combat. A Sanctum of Amyntok has 3 parts that must be set up touching each other so that they form a ring with the target inside.

abilities.name: Independent Operative
abilities.effect:
If this unit has not been deployed, set it up anywhere on the battlefield not in combat with any enemy units. This unit has now been deployed.

Designer’s Note: Enemy units that deploy after this unit can deploy in combat with it.

abilities.name: Lone Agent
abilities.effect: Add 5 to this unit’s control score while it is more than 9" from all other friendly units.

abilities.name: Supreme Swordmaster
abilities.effect: Ignore negative modifiers to hit rolls and wound rolls for this unit’s attacks. In addition, ignore negative modifiers to the characteristics of this unit’s melee weapons.

abilities.name: Spirit Armour
abilities.effect: Ignore all modifiers to save rolls for this unit (positive and negative).

abilities.name: Reservoir of Power
abilities.effect: Add 1 to casting rolls for friendly Lumineth Realm‑lords units while they are wholly within 6" of this Manifestation.

abilities.name: Transporting Vortex
abilities.declare: Pick a visible friendly Lumineth Realm‑lords unit wholly within 12" of this unit and not in combat to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Remove the target from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Windleap
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly Hurakan Windchargers unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, add 3" to the target’s Move characteristic for the rest of the turn and the target has Fly for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Deathly Furrows
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick an enemy Infantry unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each model in this unit. For each 3+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Firestealer Hammers is 4.

abilities.name: Unbreakable Bulwark
abilities.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: If this unit did not charge this turn, pick an enemy unit in combat with it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 2+, subtract 1 from the Rend characteristic of the target’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn and add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Unshakeable Faith of the Mountains
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 different friendly Alarith Aelf units wholly within 12" of this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the targets’ melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Stonemage Symbiosis
abilities.effect: The ‘Battle Damaged’ ability has no effect on this unit while it is wholly within 12" of a friendly Alarith Stonemage.

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Stoneheart Worldhammer is 3.

abilities.name: Stoneheart Shockwave
abilities.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: If this unit did not charge this turn, pick an enemy unit in combat with it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 4+, the target has Strike-last for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Stonemage Symbiosis
abilities.effect: The ‘Battle Damaged’ ability has no effect on this unit while it is wholly within 12" of a friendly Alarith Stonemage.

abilities.name: Swordsmasters
abilities.effect:
Each time this unit uses a Fight ability, you must pick either the Perfect Strike or Flurry of Blows weapon characteristics for all the attacks it makes with its Sunmetal Blades.

In addition, do not use the attack sequence for an attack made with Perfect Strike. Instead, roll a dice. On a 2+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Guardians
abilities.effect: While any friendly Scinari Heroes are wholly within this unit’s combat range, both this unit and those friendly units have Ward (5+).

abilities.name: Purest Aetherquartz
abilities.activation: Once Per Battle, Your Hero Phase
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 1 to casting rolls for this unit and subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target this unit.

abilities.name: Charge of the Lumineth
abilities.activation: Once Per Battle, Your Charge Phase
abilities.declare: Pick this unit and up to 2 friendly Vanari Dawnriders units within this unit’s combat range to be the targets.
abilities.effect: You can re-roll charge rolls for the targets for the rest of the turn. In addition, if a target charges this phase, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that target’s weapons for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Sigil of Yngra
abilities.effect:
While the unit that was picked to be the target of the ‘Summon Sanctum of Amyntok’ ability is inside the ring formed by this Manifestation:

• That unit has Ward (4+).
• If that unit is a Wizard, add 1 to that unit’s power level.
• Instead of measuring range or visibility to that unit, measure to this Manifestation instead.
• This Manifestation cannot be picked to be the target of abilities other than Banish abilities.
• If that unit uses a Move ability, makes a pile-in move or is removed from the battlefield, this Manifestation is removed from play.

abilities.name: Solar Flare
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit or Manifestation wholly within 18" of this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: If the target is a Manifestation, inflict 3D6 mortal damage on it. Otherwise, roll a dice for each model in the target unit. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Voice of Tyrion
abilities.activation: Reaction: You declared the ‘All-out Attack’ command for a friendly Vanari unit
abilities.effect: If this unit is wholly within 12" of the unit using the ‘All-out Attack’ command, no command points are spent to use that command.

warscrolls.name: Archmage Teclis and Celennar, Spirit of Hysh

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of Celennar’s Moonbright Talons is 3.

abilities.name: Aura of Celennar
abilities.effect: Add 1 to casting rolls for other friendly Lumineth Realm‑lords Wizards while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Archmage
abilities.effect: Instead of making a casting roll for this unit, you can use a value of 10 for the roll that cannot be modified. In addition, instead of making an unbinding roll or banishment roll for this unit, you can use a value of 8 for the roll that cannot be modified.

abilities.name: Storm of Searing White Light
abilities.declare: Pick any number of different visible enemy units within 18" of this unit to be the targets, then make a casting roll of 2D6 (see the ‘Archmage’ ability).
abilities.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Spirit of the Moon
abilities.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, the target cannot use commands for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Darkness of the Soul
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, subtract D6 from the target’s control score for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Absorb Despair
abilities.effect: Ignore negative modifiers to the control scores of friendly Lumineth Realm-lords units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Turn to Stone
abilities.declare: Pick each enemy unit within 6" of this Manifestation to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll. If a target has 3 mortal damage inflicted on it by this ability, it has Strike-last for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Sevireth, Lord of the Seventh Wind

abilities.name: Spirit of the Wind
abilities.effect: While friendly Hurakan units are wholly within 12" of this unit, they can use Shoot and/or Charge abilities even if they used a Run or Retreat ability in the same turn and no mortal damage is inflicted on them by Retreat abilities.

abilities.name: Searing Desert Winds
abilities.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 different enemy units in combat with this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll and subtract 1 from wound rolls for the target’s attacks for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: The Living Gale
abilities.effect: This unit cannot be targeted by shooting attacks made by enemy units that are more than 9" from this unit.

abilities.name: Rune of Enthlai
abilities.activation: Once Per Turn, Reaction: You declared the ‘Speed of Hysh’, ‘Overwhelming Heat’ or ‘Ethereal Blessings’ spell for this unit
abilities.effect: If that spell is successfully cast, roll a dice. On a 3+, after resolving the effect of that spell, this unit can immediately cast that spell a second time using the same casting roll. Do not count the second spell towards the number of Spell abilities this unit can use this turn.

abilities.name: Etheral Blessings
abilities.declare: Pick a visible friendly Lumineth Realm‑lords Infantry unit wholly within 18" of this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Ignore all modifiers to save rolls for the target (positive and negative) until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Blinding Bolts
abilities.activation: Once Per Battle, Your Shooting Phase
abilities.effect: If all of this unit’s shooting attacks this turn target the same enemy unit, subtract 1 from hit rolls for the target’s attacks for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Scryhawks
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 6" to the Range characteristic of this unit’s Starshard Bolts while it is wholly within 12" of any friendly Vanari Auralan Sentinels units.

abilities.name: Equal Prodigies
abilities.declare: Pick whether Ellania will take the lead or Ellathor will take the lead.
abilities.effect: If Ellania takes the lead, until the start of your next turn, add 1 to this unit’s power level and it has Ward (4+). If Ellathor takes the lead, until the start of your next turn, add the current battle round number to the Damage characteristic of Altairi.

abilities.name: Total Eclipse
abilities.declare: Make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Until the start of your next turn, the first time an enemy unit uses a command within 18" of this unit, your opponent must spend an additional command point to use that command.

abilities.name: Sudden Translocation
abilities.effect: This unit can use this ability if any enemy models were slain by it this turn. Heal (D6) this unit. Then, remove it from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units. When using the ‘Equal Prodigies’ ability in your next turn, you must pick Ellania to take the lead.

abilities.name: Realmscribe
abilities.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Reaction: You declared a Summon Spell ability for this unit
abilities.effect: Change the casting roll for that spell to a value of 8 that cannot be modified.

abilities.name: Shrine Guardian
abilities.effect:
While this terrain feature has a Shrine Guardian:

• This terrain feature has a Move characteristic of 6" and can use Move abilities as if it were a unit.
• The Shrine Guardian cannot use Move abilities and remains on this terrain feature each time it moves.
• Instead of measuring range or visibility to the Shrine Guardian, measure to this terrain feature instead.
• All attacks that would target the Shrine Guardian target this terrain feature instead.
• If this terrain feature is destroyed, before removing it from the battlefield, inflict D3 mortal damage on the Shrine Guardian. Then, set up the Shrine Guardian on the battlefield wholly within 3" of this terrain feature and not in combat. That unit is no longer a Shrine Guardian. If it is not possible to set up the Shrine Guardian, it is slain.

abilities.name: Cleansing Rituals
abilities.activation: Once Per Turn, Reaction: You declared a Spell ability for a unit wholly within 12" of this terrain feature
abilities.effect: While this terrain feature has a Shrine Guardian, you can re-roll the casting roll for that spell.

abilities.name: Exit the Shrine
abilities.effect: If this terrain feature has a Shrine Guardian, set up the Shrine Guardian on the battlefield wholly within 6" of this terrain feature and not in combat. That unit is no longer a Shrine Guardian.

abilities.name: Enter the Shrine
abilities.declare: If this terrain feature does not have a Shrine Guardian, pick a friendly Lumineth Realm‑lords Infantry Hero within 3" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Place the target on this terrain feature. The target is now a Shrine Guardian (see ‘Shrine Guardian’).

abilities.name: Fortitude of the Earth
abilities.effect: This unit has Ward (5+) while all of its models are contesting an objective you control.

abilities.name: Wall of Blades
abilities.effect: If this unit did not charge this turn and is in combat with an enemy unit that charged this turn, roll a dice. Add 1 to the roll if that enemy unit is Cavalry. On a 4+, this unit has Strike-first for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Vanari Bannerblade

abilities.name: World Banner
abilities.effect: Add 3 to the control scores of other friendly Lumineth Realm‑lords units while they are wholly within 18" of this unit.

warscrolls.notes: This Hero can join an eligible regiment as a Lumineth Paragon.

abilities.name: Lofted Shots
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 6" to the Range characteristic of this unit’s Auralan Bows but subtract 1 from hit rolls for this unit’s shooting attacks.

abilities.name: Spirit of the Wind
abilities.effect: While friendly Hurakan units are wholly within 12" of this unit, they can use Shoot and/or Charge abilities even if they used a Run or Retreat ability in the same turn and no mortal damage is inflicted on them by Retreat abilities.

abilities.name: Hunters of Majestic Beasts
abilities.effect: The Damage characteristic of this unit’s Bow of the Wind’s Vengeance is 3 for attacks that target Monsters.

abilities.name: Living Cyclone
abilities.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll, then this unit can move 6", but it must end that move in combat.

abilities.name: Myari Lightcaller
abilities.effect: While this unit’s Myari Lightcaller is on the battlefield, it has Wizard (1) and the Scinari keyword.

abilities.name: Dazzling Light
abilities.declare: Pick an objective that you do not control that is within 18" of and visible to this unit’s Myari Lightcaller, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Until the start of your next turn, subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made by enemy units that are contesting that objective.

abilities.name: Travel The Waterways
abilities.effect: Remove this unit from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield wholly within 6" of a battlefield edge and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Relentless as the Driving Current
abilities.effect: This unit can move 2D6". It can pass through models in enemy units but must end that move in combat.

abilities.name: Living Fissue
abilities.declare: Pick a point on the battlefield within 18" of this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Draw a straight line between the target and the closest part of this unit’s base. Roll a D3 for each unit (friendly and enemy) that the line passes across. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Stonemage Stance
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly Alarith Aelf unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, add 1 to the Rend characteristic of the target’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Windcharger Arrows
abilities.effect: Ward rolls cannot be made for damage points inflicted by this unit’s shooting attacks.
